title: Hard as Teak
description: This edition is no longer for sale. Kevin Marks escapes to the north woods to reignite his passion for photography and women. But the only flame he seems able to spark is for his latest photography subject, Teak Hildalgo, and Kevin's never been in a man's arms before.Teak, the raven-haired, photographer's dream come true, is hell bent on capturing Kevin's heart. He takes Kevin, body and soul, on a romantic, sexual journey previously lived only in Kevin's fantasies. And no dream was ever this good, no truth this undeniable.Will Kevin ever be the same? When the camera's put away, will Teak live up to his name?Content alert: erotic gay romance
author: Margie Church
